author: wtopstaff
title: Devils-Sabres Sums
text:
1 1—3 
First Period_1, Buffalo, Ennis 2 (Franson, R.O’Reilly), 8:42 (pp). 2, New Jersey, Henrique 5 (Cammalleri, Stempniak), 19:10. Penalties_Henrique, NJ (slashing), 8:30; Kalinin, NJ (tripping), 14:46; Franson, Buf (tripping), 15:41. 
Second Period_3, Buffalo, R.O’Reilly 3 (Reinhart, Ennis), 2:31. 4, New Jersey, Cammalleri 3 (Kalinin), 8:57. 5, New Jersey, Schlemko 1 (Cammalleri, Henrique), 19:11. Penalties_A.Larsson, NJ (roughing), :31; McCabe, Buf (holding), 10:05. 
Third Period_6, New Jersey, Henrique 6, 9:15 (sh). 7, Buffalo, Eichel 3 (R.O’Reilly), 19:15 (pp). Penalties_Severson, NJ (high-sticking), 8:51; O’Neill, NJ (hooking), 17:31. 
Shots on Goal_New Jersey 7-13-8_28. Buffalo 6-12-11_29. 
Power-play opportunities_New Jersey 0 of 2; Buffalo 2 of 5. 
Goalies_New Jersey, Schneider 4-1-1 (29 shots-26 saves). Buffalo, Ullmark 0-1-0 (28-24). 
A_18,040 (19,070). T_2:31. 
Referees_Greg Kimmerly, Tom Kowal. Linesmen_Tim Nowak, Brad Kovachik. Topics:
